item.title: 100 errors by a small code
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Use this:

 // third Click npc
                        NPCSlot = inStream.readSignedWord();

                        NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
                        if ((NPCID < server.npcHandler.npcs.length) && (NPCID > 0)) {
                                if (NPCID == 1526 && (!isInBank())) {
                                        openUpShop(19);
                                } else {
                                        if (NPCID == 1526 && (isInBank())) {
                                                openUpShop(50);
                                        } else {
                                                faceNPC(NPCSlot);
                                } else {
                                        if (NPCID == 1526 && (isInAxeKilla())) {       
                                                openUpShop(52);
                                        } else {
                                                faceNPC(NPCSlot);
                                        }
                                }
                        }
               }
                        break;

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors by a small code
item.dc:creator: @AbuseYourUsername AbuseYourUsername
item.description:
@AbuseYourUsername wrote:

You can’t use the command ‘break;’ without using a case.

Read full topic

item.title: 100 errors by a small code
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Hi guys, I get 100 errors when I use this code:

[code]
// third Click npc
NPCSlot = inStream.readSignedWord();

		NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
		if ((NPCID < server.npcHandler.npcs.length) && (NPCID > 0)) {
			if (NPCID == 1526 && (!isInBank())) {
				openUpShop(19);
			} else {
				if (NPCID == 1526 && (isInBank())) {
					openUpShop(50);
				} else {
					faceNPC(NPCSlot);
			} else {
				if (NPCID == 1526 && (isInAxeKilla())) {	
					openUpShop(52);
				} else {
					faceNPC(NPCSlot);
				}
			}
		}
		break;[/code]

Any ideas how to fix it? :\

Read full topic
